name: The Energy Awareness Project
description:
The Energy Awareness Project

This is a short game about saving energy in an office environment.

The player can move using the wasd keys and use the mouse to look around. Certain objects, which are highlighted, can be interacted with using the left mouse button. The whiteboard object in the game will indicate player goals that need to be completed.

Once you've completed the goals, take the quiz and receive your score. Submit your score and view the high score board to see how you rank. 

This was a team project created by Dimitrios Martin, Liam Hindley and Nicholas Easterby
